title: The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim Dragonborn Addon DLC-RELOADED
description:
nERv

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - Dragonborn (c) Bethesda Softworks
02/2013: RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION: Steam
1: DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE: RPG
With this official add-on for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, journey off the
coast of Morrowind, to the island of Solstheim. Encounter new towns
dungeons, and quests, as you traverse the ash wastes and glacial valleys of
this new land. Become more powerful with shouts that bend the will of your
enemies and even tame dragons. Your fate, and the fate of Solstheim, hangs in
the balance as you face off against your deadliest adversary - the first
Dragonborn

Features

* Explore Beyond Skyrim - Leave the province of Skyrim and travel to the
coastal island of Solstheim. Encounter the Dark Elven settlers of Raven
Rock and the native Skaal, as you unravel the mystery of a Dragonborn's
return
* New Powers - Discover dark powers as you journey into a new Daedric
realm. Collect books of forbidden knowledge and choose new paths for your
skills and abilities

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the addon. The initial Skyrim release is needed*
4. Copy over the cracked content
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!

* We've included the required updated data in this pack for your convenience
